name: The Lost Boys
description:
Made in 72 hours for the 79th Mini Jam with the theme of frogs! The restriction was: One Level.

If you are no longer getting hit when you should be, refresh the page.

All Art/Music came from OpenGameArt.org 

Intro song Little Frog in the Rain | OpenGameArt.org 

Boss Fight song Final/Boss Battle #1 | OpenGameArt.org

Win Song "Wipe Away Those Tears" (RPG Orchestral Essentials) - Sad Happy Music | OpenGameArt.org "Wipe Away Those Tears" Composed by Jonathan Shaw (www.jshaw.co.uk)
